## getLength() function

Gets length of string \| array \| object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getLength<T>(value: T): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | string \| array \| object |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

length of the input or 0
